com.io7m.r2.core.shaders.provided

Interface R2TranslucentShaderBasicParametersType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2TranslucentShaderBasicParameters

    public interface R2TranslucentShaderBasicParametersType
    The type of parameters for the basic translucent shader.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default com.io7m.jtensors.parameterized.PVectorI4F<R2SpaceRGBAType> albedoColor() 
      default R2Texture2DUsableType albedoTexture()
      An albedo map which is used primarily used to determine the opacity of the shaded surface.
      default float fadeZFar()
      A specification of the distance at which instances will be fully faded in.
      default float fadeZNear()
      A specification of the distance at which to begin fading in instances.
      R2TextureDefaultsType textureDefaults() 

    • Method Detail

      • textureDefaults

        R2TextureDefaultsType textureDefaults()
        Returns:
        A reference to the default textures

      • albedoTexture

        default R2Texture2DUsableType albedoTexture()

        An albedo map which is used primarily used to determine the opacity of the shaded surface.

        Returns:
        The albedo texture for the surface

      • albedoColor

        default com.io7m.jtensors.parameterized.PVectorI4F<R2SpaceRGBAType> albedoColor()
        Returns:
        A color value by which to multiply the final refracted image

      • fadeZNear

        default float fadeZNear()

        A specification of the distance at which to begin fading in instances. This allows instances to quickly fade out when they get too close to the view plane.

        Returns:
        The positive eye-space Z distance at which to start fading in instances
        See Also:
        fadeZFar()

      • fadeZFar

        default float fadeZFar()
        A specification of the distance at which instances will be fully faded in.
        Returns:
        The positive eye-space Z distance at which instances are fully faded in
        See Also:
        fadeZNear()
